title: From Russia With Blood
description: I am a predator - a cold-blooded killer. Nothing and no one gets in my way.As an up-and-coming, prominent member of my house, it’s my duty to prove myself.The last thing I need is to catch feelings for a human. They’re so fragile, so easily crushed.But one taste is not enough. It will never be enough.
author: Vivian Murdoch
